name: Future Apocalypse: Still Alive!
description:
A mini top down zombie survival shooter. Survive waves of zombies and hope for the best. Will you see dawn? NOTE -- This is in the earliest, pre minimum viable product state and barely qualifies as a game at the moment.

I was recently inspired by the success and simplicity of Vampire Survivors. I had gotten some new toys for Unity  a few months ago and had yet to try them out. I thought a slice of Vampire Survivors was a perfect fit for these assets. Here are some links to the main packs I am using.

  • Top Down Engine
  • POLYGON Apocalypse

I will provide a review of both products at the end of the project, assuming I get there. I'm using various other free packs for UI elements, sounds etc. I will document all the assets in the games credits before 1.0.

CONTROLS

W -- FORWARD

S -- BACK

A -- LEFT

D – RIGHT

R – RELOAD

SPACE – JUMP(But I wouldn’t!)

I – INVENTORY

LMOUSE – ATTACK
